Google I/O Conference May 17, 2017 Official Language for Android App Development Kotlin Support Announced. Since then Kotlin has become one of the most popular languages for Android developers. According to Google's data from October 2020 more than seventy percent (70%) of the top thousand apps available on Google Play use Kotlin.
